name: Velo Presto
description:
Velo Presto offers bike servicing from their state of the art mobile workshop at your home or office.
The workshop is fully equipped with Park Tools and a full range of parts and accesories from brands such as: Shimano, SRAM, BBB, Continental, Vittoria, and more.
They also offer rental bikes that can be delivered to you or to the bike track of your choice, great way to get your friends into riding.
Travel bags and cases are also availbale for rent as well as a packing and unpacking service.
Operated by a bunch of friendly and experienced bike lovers.

TriDubai special offers:
20% off Major Service or Complete Overhaul (quote code TriDXB when booking)
20% off any service package (quote code TriDXB when booking)

name: Stealth training
description:

name: Lynwood Consulting
description:
Free half day business appraisal workshop

Lynwood Consulting provides expert and genuinely independent financial and management advice with a special interest in establishing new businesses and building successful teams. Founder and owner, David Hunt is an experienced CEO and Managing Director with 30 years financial services experience in Emerging Markets. An insightful strategic thinker with a proven track record of developing and executing strategic plans David and his team are experts in building sustainable businesses across the Middle East.
There are two core areas of the business; SME and Micro Businesses Advice and Board and Advisory. SME and Micro Businesses Advice covers: cash flow, plans, planning and strategy, obtaining and raising finance, risk assessment, balancing growth and costs, marketing strategies, recruitment and staffing, and networking. The second area is Board and Advisory and with over ten yearsexperience as a Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer, David is very well placed to advise Boards and Senior Management teams on business and financial strategies such as business right sizing, strategy formulation and execution.

For further information on this offer or Lynwood Consulting please email David on lynwoodconsultingfze@gmail.com or complete the contact form at www.Lynwoodconsultinguae.com

name: Los Olivos Cycling & Triathlon Training Camp
description:
Los Olivos Cycling & Triathlon Training Camp TriDubai members 15% discount
*Services we can offer:
Guided road cycling custom tours that will take riders through different villages, towns and cities; these tours are usually for a week or more and are for groups of not fewer than 4 guests. These tours are organized according to the ability and fitness level of the group; scheduled routes are organized according to the groups desired stops, etc; we design these tours after completing thorough consultations with the athletes at least three months in advance. These custom tours are completely supported with vehicle, mechanic and tools following the riders, they include excellent accommodations with breakfast and dinner along the way. These tours include pickup and return to the airport (Malaga or Granada). Pricing these tours are done according to the route and time of the year.
* Self training staying at our country house where you have your own room for 2. Information on where to ride, run and swim is provided by us; this information can be organized as per the needs of each athlete. Healthy breakfasts and dinners can be supplied at the house for 7.50 and 10 Euros respectively. Minimum stay is 2 days. Pickup and return to airport (Malaga or Granada) can be arranged for 150 and 90 Euros respectively each trip for groups of not more than 8.
*Targeting local races is a good way to plan and spend your active holiday. There are many tri races in the area from April to October; athletes can train for one or two weeks prior one of these races and test themselves in any of these local competitions; sprint, olympic, half and full distances are available - inquire with us for schedules, etc

name: My PediaClinic
description:
This is a special offer for all our TriDubai friends. MyPediaClinic is offering a special 50% off adult dental services with fellow TriDubai member Dr. Nidhi Kotak. These services include:

*Detecting the cavities caused by energy gels

*Cleaning your teeth for that perfect finish line picture

*Whitening your teeth so that cars can spot you safely from a distance at night in Al Qudra

*Fixing those front teeth that break when someone accidentally punches you in the face during the swim leg of a race

Call MyPediaClinic now on 04-4305926 to avail 50% off your consult, X Rays, cleaning and whitening.

This offer is valid till Feb 1st 2020.

name: RAK Leisure
description:
Offer 1:
RAK Leisure invites TriDubai members to enjoy two of our exciting dining outlets located on Jebel Jais mountain in Ras Al Khaimah. We’re excited to announce the opening of 1484 by Puro – the highest restaurant in the UAE. Found a staggering 1,484 meters above sea level, you’ll find it beside the welcome center of Toroverde. The new restaurant offers incredible views of the Hajar mountain with both indoor and terrace seating.
Puro Express is located at the Jais Viewing Deck, where you will find stunning 360 degree views of the natural landscape. TriDubai members are welcome to join us at any time and receive a 20% discount off their bill, until 30th September 2021.
Timings:
1484 By Puro: Every day from 8am – 7pm
Puro Express: Wednesday to Sunday from 9am – 7pm
——————————————————————————————————————————————————
Offer 2:
RAK Leisure invites TriDubai members to enjoy its new adventure experience in Jebel Jais mountain in Ras Al Khaimah. We’re excited to announce the opening of Bear Grylls Explorers Camp, run by Bear Grylls’ team of highly trained instructors and  in the field of survival to demonstrate his dynamic methods and techniques.
Courses available:
24hr adult survival course
24hr family survival course
8hr survival course
Half-day survival course
https://www.beargryllscamp.ae/#camp 
https://www.instagram.com/beargryllscamp/

name: ROKA
description:
Roka offers TriDubai members a discount on its product which can vary depending on the items. In general it is a 25% discount.
To claim your discount, you need to create an account on Roka or login to your existing account to TriClub “TriDubai” using a password 9467.

name: MVMT
description:

Our three main classes are BURN, METCON and ENDURANCE.

MVMT Fit’s MISSION is to empower individuals to reach their goals through results focused training led by a team focused on service excellence.

10% off monthly/annual memberships.

name: Runners-tribe
description:
Runners-tribe offers 20% discount on the entire assortment to TRI DUBAI community members. This includes HOKA ONE ONE, VIVOBAREFOOT, ASICS, NIKE, and other leading running brands. Promo code TRIDXB20

Runners-tribe - is Dubai grown and independent online shop focusing on running. We are built on mindset, 'for runners by runners' with the ultimate goal to build and serve the community.

name: Drink-Dry
description:
Drink Dry is the first online marketplace for premium non-alcoholic drinks in the UAE.
The online platform was founded in 2019 by Erika Doyle, with the intention of gathering good quality alcohol free drinks under one umbrella and to make it easier for those looking for alternatives to alcohol to quench their thirst.
The online marketplace offers a curated selection of non-alcoholic beers, spirits, still and sparkling wines, cocktails and tonic mixers – all one click away and conveniently delivered to your doorstep.
Not to mention that Drink Dry’s premium non-alcoholic beverages contain less sugar and calories compared to average adult drinks, making them the perfect indulgent drinks that you can enjoy guilt-free.

Use Discount code TRIDUBAI15 to get 15% off your order!
